start.text: Not the best testing material, but it'll have to do.
Don't let the test subjects get away. I have big plans for them.

start_boss.text: Can't wait to get my hands on this one.
Let's get closer, I want to observe it in full detail.
An excellent sample. It will be a pity to destroy it.

engaged.text: Surrender yourselves now and you'll be provided with extra painkillers during the tests.
I will make sure that your bodies will serve for the benefit of humanity.
All obedient and submissive specimens will be taken good care of. I promise...

retreat.text: Saving the research and testing team.
We must preserve the intellectual power of humankind when we can.
These specimens are too troublesome. Better leave them till the next time.
Time to leave the testing area.
The longer we live, the more we will learn and uncover.

out_of_missiles.text: Missiles have been depleted. An unfortunate setback.
Out of missiles. Commencing close contact with test subjects.

need_help.text: I'm afraid I'm in dire need of assistance!
I'm not very fit for this sort of combat situations, please assist me!
Someone, help! My research documentation is too valuable to be lost!

pursuing.text: Please, no need to run. Let me shape you into something beautiful...
Please, trust me, you're going to love your new selves once I'm finished...
There is no shame in abandoning your humanity. There might be some physical and psychological pain however...
Your anatomy and physiology are imperfect. I shall fix that...
I cannot wait to see the results of breeding you with other specimens. So much potential, so much data...
All my specimens enjoy their new selves. Even if they can no longer be classified as humans...

running.text: Breaking contact with the test subjects.
Increasing the distance to the specimens.

hull_90.text: The specimens are showing signs of aggression. Curious.
Not every day my testing subjects fight back. I'm positively surprised.
Please, no need to fight back. I only want to help you and humankind.

hull_50.text: Hull is at half integrity. Assistance would be much appreciated.
Hull at 50%. I'm afraid the testing isn't going as was planned.
Hull down to precisely 50%. Think I will need a new vessel to proceed with my research.

hull_30.text: Hull is at... 30%. I'm afraid this sort of testing is no longer sustainable...
Research teams aren't meant to be on the front!
I didn't sign up for this at the biolabs!
No! Stay back! The test subjects aren't meant to harm the researchers!

overload.text: Requiring support until all systems are back online!
This is not good... Hope my research documentation will be alright...

death.text: My mother told me not to go into combat science unit...-
I only wanted to make you beautiful...-
I had so much to learn still...-
I can still save my research, just gotta get to the safepo-...

victory.text: Now, time to collect the surviving specimens.
Please, make sure that as many test subjects as possible have been apprehended and transported to my field lab.
Team, please prepare the operating room and my instruments. We have much work to do.
Ah, perfect, I can finally get back to my research.
